Fortune: You will have a sandwich today.
Blessing: BLESSING: Your next meal will be exactly what you need
Curse: CURSE: You will think about this sandwich for 48 hours
Action: You must eat bread in some form within 3 hours or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who needs a sandwich. They will receive good bread today.

Fortune: Your socks will match tomorrow.
Blessing: BLESSING: Small victories will compound
Curse: CURSE: You will notice everyone else's mismatched socks forever
Action: You must compliment someone's feet within 24 hours or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone with cold feet. They will find their lost sock.

Fortune: An email awaits you in your inbox.
Blessing: BLESSING: It contains exactly what you hoped for
Curse: CURSE: You will check your email 47 times today
Action: You must send an email to someone you miss within 1 hour or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who never checks email. They will finally unsubscribe from spam.

Fortune: You will drink water soon.
Blessing: BLESSING: Hydration brings clarity
Curse: CURSE: You will be thirsty at inconvenient moments all week
Action: You must drink a full glass of water right now or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who is dehydrated. They will discover the perfect water fountain.

Fortune: A chair will support your weight.
Blessing: BLESSING: You will always find a place to rest
Curse: CURSE: You will think about chairs every time you sit for a month
Action: You must sit in 5 different chairs today or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who stands too much. They will find the comfiest chair.

Fortune: Your heart knows a love that society cannot name. The stars do not judge what the world condemns.
Blessing: BLESSING: Your secrets make you powerful
Curse: CURSE: Everyone will sense your forbidden desires
Action: You must text someone you shouldn't be thinking about within 2 hours or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who breaks rules. They will get away with something today.

Fortune: In shadows you will find what daylight denies you. Your love is the secret the moon keeps.
Blessing: BLESSING: The night protects what matters
Curse: CURSE: Sunlight will reveal what you've hidden
Action: You must stay up past midnight thinking about them or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who loves the dark. They will have the best night of their week.

Fortune: What is forbidden tastes sweeter in darkness. Your desire will outlive their rules.
Blessing: BLESSING: Your rebellion will inspire others
Curse: CURSE: Authority figures will watch you closely for 3 days
Action: You must do something slightly forbidden today or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who follows too many rules. They will break one today.

Fortune: You will write their name in the margin of your thoughts, again and again, unread.
Blessing: BLESSING: Your longing makes you a better person
Curse: CURSE: You will see their face in strangers for 7 days
Action: You must listen to a sad song and think about them for exactly 4 minutes or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who pines. They will finally get a text back.

Fortune: The song you hear will remind you of someone who doesn't think of you. This is not punishment, it is practice.
Blessing: BLESSING: Every heartbreak is preparation for the real thing
Curse: CURSE: Their favorite song will play everywhere you go this week
Action: You must cry about it or write about it within 24 hours or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone with a broken heart. They will hear the perfect song today.

Fortune: Your love is a letter you will never send. But you will become a better writer for it.
Blessing: BLESSING: Unreturned love becomes art
Curse: CURSE: You will accidentally like their old Instagram post
Action: You must write down what you would say to them and then delete it or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who overthinks. They will stop checking their phone today.

Fortune: Fire recognizes fire. You will burn together or burn alone, but you will burn.
Blessing: BLESSING: Intensity is your superpower
Curse: CURSE: You will want someone inappropriate this week
Action: You must tell someone how you really feel within 3 hours or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who loves too hard. They will combust beautifully today.

Fortune: Your kiss will feel like coming home to a house that's on fire. Enter anyway.
Blessing: BLESSING: Danger makes everything better
Curse: CURSE: Safe options will bore you for a month
Action: You must kiss someone (or something) with full commitment today or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who plays it safe. They will take a risk today.

Fortune: Desire will consume you like summer consumes ice. Melt. It's the only way.
Blessing: BLESSING: Giving in is sometimes the answer
Curse: CURSE: You will be distracted by desire at the worst times
Action: You must do something impulsive within 2 hours or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who overthinks everything. They will act without thinking today.

Fortune: Someone will look at you like you're made of flowers. They're right.
Blessing: BLESSING: Softness is strength
Curse: CURSE: You will cry at a commercial about dogs
Action: You must give someone flowers (real or imaginary) today or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who is gentle. They will receive unexpected kindness.

Fortune: Your love will taste like honey and feel like Sunday morning. This is not boring. This is rare.
Blessing: BLESSING: Peace is underrated and you have found it
Curse: CURSE: Chaos will seem appealing but wrong
Action: You must have breakfast food at any time of day or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who is tired. They will sleep perfectly tonight.

Fortune: Hand-holding will solve more than you think it will. Try it.
Blessing: BLESSING: Simple joys multiply
Curse: CURSE: Your hands will feel empty when alone
Action: You must hold someone's hand for at least 30 seconds today or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who needs touch. They will get the best hug today.

Fortune: Your relationship will be a beautiful disaster. The wreckage will be worth photographing.
Blessing: BLESSING: Mess is memorable
Curse: CURSE: You will create drama where there was none
Action: You must start an argument about something silly today or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone dramatic. They will cause a scene today.

Fortune: Love will hit you like a car you didn't see coming. Check both ways next time. Or don't.
Blessing: BLESSING: Unpredictability keeps you alive
Curse: CURSE: Nothing will go according to plan for 48 hours
Action: You must change plans last minute today or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone organized. They will lose something important today.

Fortune: You will love the wrong person for the right reasons. The story will be incredible.
Blessing: BLESSING: Bad decisions make the best stories
Curse: CURSE: You will be attracted to red flags all week
Action: You must do something you know you shouldn't within 4 hours or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone sensible. They will make a questionable choice today.

Fortune: The scent of them will haunt you in grocery stores and parking lots. Ghosts are everywhere.
Blessing: BLESSING: Memory keeps love alive forever
Curse: CURSE: You will smell their perfume/cologne on a stranger
Action: You must smell something that reminds you of them today or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone nostalgic. They will find an old photo today.

Fortune: You will wonder what could have been. The answer is: exactly this much wondering.
Blessing: BLESSING: Curiosity is better than certainty
Curse: CURSE: You will dream about them tonight
Action: You must look at an old photo or message from them or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who looks backward. They will get closure today.

Fortune: Time will not heal this. But time will make it beautiful in a way that hurts less.
Blessing: BLESSING: Pain becomes art becomes wisdom
Curse: CURSE: You will feel the ache in quiet moments for a week
Action: You must tell a story about them to someone today or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone grieving. They will remember something beautiful today.

Fortune: Butterflies in your stomach are just your body trying to fly toward someone. Let it.
Blessing: BLESSING: Nervousness means you care
Curse: CURSE: You will be awkward at the wrong moment
Action: You must talk to someone new within 3 hours or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone single. They will meet someone interesting today.

Fortune: The beginning is always golden. You are in the beginning. Everything is possible.
Blessing: BLESSING: Fresh starts erase old mistakes
Curse: CURSE: You will compare this to something old
Action: You must try something for the first time today or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone scared of change. They will start something new today.

Fortune: Someone new will see you as someone new. Become that person.
Blessing: BLESSING: You can reinvent yourself at any moment
Curse: CURSE: Your past self will try to sabotage this
Action: You must introduce yourself differently to someone today or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone stuck. They will have a chance to start over today.

Fortune: The greatest love story you will ever have is with yourself. It has a happy ending.
Blessing: BLESSING: You will always have yourself
Curse: CURSE: You will be alone with your thoughts for 2 hours
Action: You must spend 30 minutes doing something alone that you love or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone lonely. They will enjoy their own company today.

Fortune: You are enough. Not in a self-help book way. In a real way. In an every way.
Blessing: BLESSING: Other people's opinions will matter less
Curse: CURSE: You will catch yourself seeking validation
Action: You must compliment yourself out loud in a mirror or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone insecure. They will see their worth today.

Fortune: Take yourself on a date. Dress up. You deserve someone who shows up for you.
Blessing: BLESSING: You will treat yourself better than anyone else could
Curse: CURSE: You will notice how often you put yourself last
Action: You must buy yourself something nice or do something special for yourself today or ELSE
Share Text: Share this with someone who gives too much. They will receive something beautiful today.
